summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Forest Street, from 17th Avenue South to 23rd Avenue South; 23rd Avenue South, from Forest Street to Lander Street; and Lander Street, from 21st Avenue South to 23rd Avenue South; by grading and curbing the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 411 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
